name: Cannon Fodder Collection
overview: War has never been so much fun. it's the perfectly action packed Cannon Fodder, plus it's sequel Cannon Fodder 2 and all expansions and demo discs. First developed by Sensible Software in 1993, you the player control a small squad of up to five soldiers through more than 20 missions as you take out enemy units, buildings and vehicles in some of the best games ever released. Thanks to Earok you can now play all these fine games on your Amiga CD32!
